channel.title: Torify Debian Testing VM
channel.description:
Im interested in testing so create VM on virtualbox and install debian testing dvd and try to torified this vm with this settings:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems
but have just corrupted connection,network adapter not connected.
I think there is something missed on wiki page or not tested for sure yet,does someone test torify other vms beside whonix?

item.title: Torify Debian Testing VM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you manually create the Whonix-Custom-Workstation or used the new downloadable template?

The former instructions have been used by many people, so I don’t think anything is missing.

Read full topic

item.title: Torify Debian Testing VM
item.dc:creator: bmtkn
item.description:
Im interested in testing so create VM on virtualbox and install debian testing dvd and try to torified this vm with this settings:

Whonix – 1 May 20

Other Operating Systems - Whonix

Anonymize any Operating System! Your operating system tunneled through the Tor Anonymity Network! Create your Whonix-Custom-Workstation ™!

but have just corrupted connection,network adapter not connected.

I think there is something missed on wiki page or not tested for sure yet,does someone test torify other vms beside whonix?
